participant_1.background:
I'm maintaining a healthy weight by surfing often and eating a balanced diet.
I like to sharpen my blade and practice my sword skills in my free time.
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions.
my sister is becoming my mother and often asks me when i m getting married.

participant_2.background:
I loved reading books from the bookstore with my mom when I was a kid.
I ride my bike to class, and I visit animal shelters to give the animals some love.
i need extra iron in my diet.
my weekends are spent studying and looking over client files.
I have been struggling with my mental health recently.

content.text: Hey there, how's your day going?
Hi, my day is going great! I just got back from visiting my mom. We had a really nice time reading books together.
That sounds lovely. I love reading books too. I'm currently reading a book about the universe.
That sounds really interesting! I wish I was more into science. I'm more of a history person.
That's cool too! I love learning about history. I'm actually really into the history of sword fighting.
That's awesome! I've always been a bit of a wimp when it comes to fighting. I'm more of a lover than a fighter.
That's okay. I'm not really a fighter either. I just like to learn about it. I actually practice sword fighting in my free time.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to sword fight.
It's not as hard as it looks. I'm sure you could do it if you wanted to.
Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
I'd love to see you give it a try. I could teach you some basics.
That would be great! I'd love to learn from you.
